I did something fun with @zomato! Check it out 🍅

https://t.co/ACdApBqSUa

urgent attention🚨

@zomato @zomatocare 

I wouldn't want call to you this but you are an "exploiter"

From not paying the delivery executive enough, promoting bizzare and menacing strategy like "10 minutes delivery" to ignoring the health and care of delivery executive.

 ++++

Today on a summer afternoon of Delhi "41°C" a DE came to deliver my food from from a restaurant 2kms away from my home. 

I am shocked to see a company like @zomato @zomatocare couldn't provide a needy with a two wheeler who actually works for them.

++

Another tragic situation would be to witness these DEs climbing the building which doesn't have a lift and customers being not so co-operative. 

I mean, i understand you providing them employment but can't you lend a two wheeler for your own service @zomato @zomatocare ?

Welp—just got denied Paxlovid by my healthcare plan. Got told they will only give out to severely immunocompromised—like organ transplant, chemotherapy, or HIV. So, not having a thymus gland doesn’t qualify🤷🏻‍♂️. (“T-cells” officially called thymus-derived lymphocytes)

Meanwhile: https://t.co/HmxDa1RO0u

3) I do wish I had all of my right lung 🫁 though - lost part of it when I was 17 years old. A thymus gland would give me more peace of mind too. But such is life. Many people have unseen immunocompromised/ risk factors. Let’s all try to protect each other. 🙏 https://t.co/AC0WrjA0VP

3) I lost my thymus gland when I was 17 years old. T-cell maturation mostly happens when you’re young and in teenage years. So its borderline debatable how immunocompromised I am. But thymus can stay active until 40s. https://t.co/AC0WrjA0VP

The yellow-spotted rock hyrax can be a bit clingy. How so? Its feet are specially equipped for scaling rocky terrain, thanks to secretions from a special gland on the bottom of its hairless feet. Its moistened paws contract into a cup shape, creating a suction cup-like effect!🐾 https://t.co/kaxiZVJVpG
Hypothyroidism is when your thyroid gland doesn’t make enough of certain key hormones. Symptoms to watch for: https://t.co/TfW9ndKeiv https://t.co/CU3pL2JAMp
